resources.string: Lightning can’t strike in the same place twice.
All of your taste buds are on your tongue.
People are born with more bones than they have in adulthood.
The skin is the body’s largest organ.
Disney’s first full-color animated film was Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.
Venus is the hottest planet in the solar system
Hot and cold water sound the same when poured.
All stars in the night sky are roughly the same size.
